job_title: System Development Engineer/DevOps Engineer, DCN Network Planning
listing_jobDesc:
• 3+ years of experience in building production software applications.
• Experience deploying and operating Linux or other UNIX variants in a datacenter environment. 
• Experience with server hardware management across multiple vendors. 
• Software development skills and programming experience with at least one modern language such as Python, Java, C, C++, or C# including object-oriented design
• Knowledge of standard internet protocols (Ethernet, ARP, IP, ICMP, UDP, TCP, SSL, DNS, HTTP, etc.) 
• Excellent troubleshooting skills

Job summary
Amazon Web Services (AWS) is looking for a Systems Development Engineer for the AWS Network organization. This position is located in Dublin, Ireland and working in the heart of the AWS global network. We are seeking talented engineers skilled in the art of integration who can bridge gaps between systems, software, and ops – and are not constrained by how “things are usually done”. The engineers within our organization are instrumental in allowing us drive the stability and sustainability of our next-generation networks and to discover innovative ways to automate and scale our network.
Indirectly, our goal is to eliminate human intervention and errors from network engineering and network build processes. In this role, you will work on a team with network development engineers to troubleshoot, maintain, and develop key systems that enable us to plan and scale our global network. 
Systems Development Engineers are expected to develop best practices, refine operational procedures and constantly innovate proactively. You will continuously identify areas of growth within the existing frameworks, tools and processes to develop new technical mechanisms to reduce waste and continuously improve.
Our ideal candidate is highly autonomous, very detail oriented, possesses strong written and verbal communication skills and has significant experience working at scale. Systems Development Engineers work hand-in-hand with Software Development and Network Deployment teams to invent new ways of deploying, scaling and operating Amazon's Next-Generation Network while never losing sight of the high security bar our customers demand.
Key job responsibilities
Own the full stack of our products, from design/architecture to implementation and continuous iterative development
Develop systems and new features to meet the needs of our customers
Use and develop tools and processes to collect and rationalize data from different sources
Use and develop tools and frameworks to reduce our operational workload
Enhance and optimise the performance of existing systems
Participate in an oncall rotation with your team
Work closely with Network Engineering teams to ensure fast, smooth software roll-outs
Identify and troubleshoot recurring platform issues with effective escalation to senior-level engineering teams
Contribute to documentation, process and procedures
Be involved in the formulation of a structured training
Design and recommend optimization for service delivery and fleets
A day in the life
A typical day could involve developing a new feature to meet a customer request, troubleshooting platform performance issues that are impacting output, or trying to automate a process step to simplify life for your colleagues.

Strong computer science fundamentals, data structures, algorithm design and problem solving skillsKnowledge of professional software engineering practices & best practices for full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, continuous deployments, testing and operationsStrong IP networking fundamentals and experience with the application of IP protocolsExperience developing cloud software services and an understanding of design for scalability, performance and reliability.Demonstrated ability to mentor junior software engineers in all aspects of their engineering skill-sets.Experience in communicating with users, other technical teams and senior management to collect requirements, describe software product features, technical designs and product strategy.Ability to take a project from scoping requirements through to actual launch of the project.A strong customer orientation.5+ years professional experience developing softwareAWS Certification a plus
Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates. • 3+ years of experience in building production software applications.

• Experience with server hardware management across multiple vendors. 
• Software development skills and programming experience with at least one modern language such as Python, Java, C, C++, or C# including object-oriented design
• Knowledge of standard internet protocols (Ethernet, ARP, IP, ICMP, UDP, TCP, SSL, DNS, HTTP, etc.)
